items.title: Revisiting the missing mass problem in MOND for nearby galaxy clusters
items.summary: arXiv:2602.06082v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: In the framework of Milgromian dynamics (MOND), galaxy clusters are known to exhibit a residual missing mass problem, with the baryonic mass falling short of the dynamical mass by about a factor of two. The baryon content of cluster…
